description: A collection of data merge text placeholders.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Creates a data merge text placeholder.

parameters.description: The story in which to insert the placeholder.
parameters.name: parentStory

parameters.description: The position within the story at which to insert the placeholder, specified as an offset number or an insertion point. Can accept: InsertionPoint or Long Integer.
parameters.name: storyOffset

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new DataMergeTextPlaceholder (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the DataMergeTextPlaceholder.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholders within the specified range.

parameters.description: The DataMergeTextPlaceholder, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: DataMergeTextPlaceholder, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The DataMergeTextPlaceholder, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: DataMergeTextPlaceholder, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the DataMergeTextPlaceholder that follows the desired DataMergeTextPlaceholder.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder whose index follows the specified DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.

parameters.description: The DataMergeTextPlaceholder whose index comes before the desired DataMergeTextPlaceholder.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every DataMergeTextPlaceholder in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DataMergeTextPlaceholder.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeTextPlaceholder with the specified index.

name: DataMergeTextPlaceholders
